alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 1:14PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Uintah County through 145 PM MDT... At 114 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Manila, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Uintah County. This includes U.S. Highway 191 in Utah between mile markers 362 and 378. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Uinta Basin; Eastern Uinta Mountains
